data.candidateName: Montana Citizens for Right to Work

expenditures.Entity Name: Montana Citizens for Right to Work
expenditures.Purpose: Mailing asking our supporters to encourage their candidates for state legislature to support Right to Work.
expenditures.Expenditure Paid Communications Subject: Asked our supporters to encourage the following candidates to register their support for the Right to Work issue: Braxton Mitchell, Debo Powers, Scot Kerns, Brad Hamlet, Larry Brewster, Terry Dennis, Jane Gillette, Brian Gabriel Popiel, Mike Hopkins, Tom Browder, Ed Hill, Krystal Steinmetz, Seth Berglee, Elizabeth "Betsy" Scanlin, Marta Bertoglio, Bryher Herak, Lana Hamilton, Marilyn Marler, Scott Price, Jen Gross, Terry Gauthier and Catherine Scott.
